item.title: ‘Trainspotting’s’ Robert Carlyle Directing Short Film ‘Three,’ Starring Victoria Hamilton, Isaac Gryn and Nicholas Rowe (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: “Trainspotting” and “The Full Monty” star Robert Carlyle is returning to the director’s chair with the short film “Three.” The short is led by Victoria Hamilt
